extendedInfo.description: New: Traffic Alerts (from May 2012).Receive real time traffic alerts for Paris public transport network.Specify on which lines, on which days and at what times you want your alerts delivered. This new service is 100% free (application & alerts delivery) and provided by official RATP app for Android.See the RATP maps on mobile: - Maps of the lines: RER (A and B), Metro, Bus, Noctilien, Tramway (T1 to T3) lines and airports (Roissy and Orlybus) - Maps stations including the exit numbers and buses nearby. **************************************** RATP is the official application of the RATP, is designed to optimize the movement of users in the Paris (works with EDGE, 3G or Wifi): - Check schedules in real time for Bus, RER, Metro, Bus, Noctilien, tram lines and airports. - Calculate your route through a multimodal search and access to the planes of rows affected directly from the road - Travel calmly, check at any time disturbances, work, events and incidents with the RATP network traffic bulletin / Transilien. RATP urban transport operator in Paris and the Ile de France region: Metro, RER (lines A and B), Tramway (T1 to T3), Bus, Noctiliens lines and airports (Roissy and Orly Bus). **************************************** Customer service RATP: If you have any ideas or questions about the next steps in the application, require assistance to access services or identify bugs, thank you for contacting us at the email address: maratpdanslapoche@ratp.fr. Our customer service will give you the answer. We cannot respond to written notice from the Market. If you want assistance, thank you communicate your request to Customer Service mentioned above. ****************************************

reviews.title: Excellent
reviews.comment: What can I say?.... Does exactly what it says. Easy to use & follow. I\'d be lost in the underground passages without it. For once the RATP is on top of things.... Now, only thing left to do is to assure transport service
reviews.author: Deonie Lambert

reviews.title: N\'importe quoi comme permissions!
reviews.comment: Pour quelle raison cette appli doit acc\303\251der aux status du t\303\251l\303\251phone et \303\240 mes contacts pour fonctionner?? Vous pensez peut-\303\252tre que nous ne lisons pas la demande de permissions?

reviews.title: Manque encore des lignes
reviews.comment: Je travaille \303\240 Roissy, mais je ne connais pas tous les bus \303\240 prendre pour arriver \303\240 l\'heure. Ce serait bien de comprendre dans l\'application les lignes de bus qui desservent autour de l\'a\303\251roport  Roissy CDG, car on ne peut pas compter sur la ponctualit\303\251 du RER B.
reviews.author: Karuna Tiwari

reviews.title: Mode hors ligne
reviews.comment: Pourquoi l\'appli \'visit paris by m\303\251tro\' a le mode hors ligne et pas celle ci.  Est-il possible de rendre le widget horaire a une taille 4x1? Il prend trop de place.  Et svp utiliser la fonctionnalit\303\251 backup de Google.
reviews.author: Minh Quan Tran

reviews.title: Stop ruining my favorites
reviews.comment: I dont want to keep losing my favorites every time I update .. You heard? Take more care for crying out loud.. You lose two stars

reviews.title: Useful for tourists.
reviews.comment: Great application for roaming around in paris. I use it regularly for metro navigation. 5 stars if offline navigation is made available.

reviews.title: Good but needs to work offline
reviews.comment: Would give 5 stars if basic routing worked offline
reviews.author: David Stamp

reviews.title: Average (peut mieux faire !)
reviews.comment: The predictive text is very poor. E.g. Stations beginning with Saint, some have a hyphen, some don\'t, if you don\'t add the hyphen, you may not find the station you\'re looking for.  Another example is stations beginning with the definite article but that are commonly referred to minus the article e. g. Les Gobelins. Just typing \'Gobelins\' should find that station, but it doesn\'t. And it can\'t distinguish between addresses and stations. Type in 11 rue de la Sant\303\251 and it will send you to station Rue Saint Maur
reviews.author: Kevin Harrigan

reviews.title: Crap
reviews.comment: App bugging all the time usless

reviews.title: Inutilisable, mauvais portage
reviews.comment: Application tr\303\250s lente, voire non r\303\251active, mauvais itin\303\251raires, plans faux,...  Un portage tr\303\250s mal r\303\251alis\303\251 alors que c\'\303\251tait pas mal sur iPhone. NE Pas Utiliser avant une mise \303\240 jour correctrice.

reviews.title: Utile
reviews.comment: Bonne appli mais encore pas mal de bugs. Il y a une incompatibilit\303\251 avec le clavier touchpal (il disparait d\303\250s qu\'on essaye d\'\303\251crire) En plus il y a un bouton \"leave sooner\" et un \"arrive earlier\" c\'est un peu d\303\251stabilisant \303\251tant donn\303\251 que ca revient au m\303\252me
